item.title: Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band - Old Time Rock And Roll - Key of G - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Old Time Rock And Roll by Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band from the channel ukeplayalongs. Chords used in the song: C, D, G.

item.title: Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band - Night Moves - DrJillReese
item.description: Play along video for the song Night Moves by Bob Seger & The Silver Bullet Band from the channel DrJillReese. Chords used in the song: C, Cmaj7, D, Em, F, G, G7.
